      Description copied from interface: YahtzeeModel

      public boolean isGameFinished()
      Description copied from interface: YahtzeeModel

    • registerTurnFinished

      public void registerTurnFinished​(Player playerFinishingTurn)
      Description copied from interface: YahtzeeModel
      Called by a player object when the player finishes their turn. This allows the model to assign the next player as the active player, or to finish the game.
